TEXT.TITLE: RABBIT SOFTWARE <RABT> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Rabbit Software Corp said it has agreed in principle to acquire privately-held communications hardware maker Micro Plus II Corp for about two mln common shares, with closing expected by May. Reuter
